body.bibl: Hofmann, Tessa. “The Treatment of Christian Denominations in the Republic of Turkey.” In Writing and Re-Writing History by Destruction: Proceedings of the Annual Minerva Center RIAB Conference, Leipzig, 2018. Research on Israel and Aram in Biblical Times III, edited by Angelika Berlejung, Aren M. Maeir, and Takayoshi M. Oshima, 305–21. Orientalische Religionen in Der Antike 45.
